## Problem / Motivation

A clear description of the problem this feature would solve, or the use case it enables.

## Proposed Solution

Describe what you'd like to happen. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other tools, or anything else that helps explain the request.
